General.Name: Changzhou Xiangming Intelligent Drive System Corporation
General.Description: Changzhou Xiangming Intelligent Drive System Corporation engages in the research and development, production, and sale of micro motors, fans, and intelligent components in China. The company offers AC motors, brushless DC motors, brush DC motors, precise fans, magnetic coupling pumps, precise reducers and drivers, control components and software products, and other technical solutions; ventilation appliances; and health care appliances. Its products are used in HVAC, transport vehicle, cold chain logistics, IT, intelligent manufacturing and logistics, medical and health care, and other industries. The company also exports to Europe, Asia, and the Americas. Changzhou Xiangming Intelligent Drive System Corporation was founded in 1995 and is based in Changzhou, China.
